controller

Class BallController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.BallController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RubberBallModel

    public abstract class BallController
extends java.lang.Object
    BallController is an Abstract Class that handles all the implementations regarding the Ball Movement.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BallController

        public BallController(java.awt.geom.Point2D center,
                      int radiusA,
                      int radiusB,
                      java.awt.Color inner,
                      java.awt.Color border)
        BallController is a Parameterized Constructor that handles the initial implementation of the ball. Handles the ball movement. Creates the ball. Sets the initial ball speeds in the x and y direction to 0 at the beginning of the game.
        Parameters:
        center - the initial location of the ball.
        radiusA - the width of the ball.
        radiusB - the height of the ball.
        inner - the inner color of the ball.
        border - the border color of the ball.

    • Method Detail

      • makeBall

        protected abstract java.awt.Shape makeBall(java.awt.geom.Point2D center,
                                           int radiusA,
                                           int radiusB)
        makeBall is an Abstract Method which creates the ball. This method will later be implemented by the RubberBallModel or any other extensions the programmer wishes to add.
        Parameters:
        center - the initial location of the ball.
        radiusA - the width of the ball.
        radiusB - the height of the ball.
        Returns:
        returns the ball.

      • move

        public void move()
        move is a Method that implements the width and height of the ball when in motion.

      • setSpeed

        public void setSpeed(int x,
                     int y)
        setSpeed is a Setter Method that sets the ball speed in both the x-axis and y-axis direction.
        Parameters:
        x - an integer variable that sets speedX value.
        y - an integer variable that sets speedY value.

      • setXSpeed

        public void setXSpeed(int s)
        setXSpeed is a Setter Method that sets the ball speed in the x-axis direction. Encapsulation of the speedX variable.
        Parameters:
        s - an integer variable that sets speedX value.

      • setYSpeed

        public void setYSpeed(int s)
        setYSpeed is a Setter Method that sets the ball speed in the y-axis direction. Encapsulation of the speedY variable.
        Parameters:
        s - an integer variable that sets speedY value.

      • reverseX

        public void reverseX()
        reverseX is a Method that sets the ball speed in the x-axis direction in the reverse direction. ball moves in negative x-axis direction. Used after ball makes impact and returns back.

      • reverseY

        public void reverseY()
        reverseY is a Method that sets the ball speed in the y-axis direction in the reverse direction. ball moves in negative y-axis direction. Used after ball makes impact and returns back.

      • getBorderColor

        public java.awt.Color getBorderColor()
        getBorderColor is a Getter Method that returns the ball's border color. Encapsulation of the border color variable.
        Returns:
        returns the border color of the ball.

      • getInnerColor

        public java.awt.Color getInnerColor()
        getInnerColor is a Getter Method that returns the ball's border color. Encapsulation of the inner color variable.
        Returns:
        returns the inner color of the ball.

      • getPosition

        public java.awt.geom.Point2D getPosition()
        getPosition is a Getter Method that returns the ball's center location.
        Returns:
        returns the center position for the initial location of the ball.

      • getBallFace

        public java.awt.Shape getBallFace()
        getBallFace Method that returns the ballFace. Encapsulation of the ballFace variable.
        Returns:
        the shape and features of the ball.

                       double height)
        setPoints is a Private Method that sets the Screen points
        Parameters:

        height - the height of the screen
